raw_body: MAHALAKSHMI (Lakshmi), Beloved wife of late Wijayaratnam Navaratnam, daughter of late Mr & Mrs Sathasivam Kumarasamy, daughter-in-law of late Mr & Mrs S. K Wijayaratnam, sister of late Kamala, Leela, Sathasivam, Mahesan, Punitham, and Kumaradevan (UK). Viewing from 9am on Monday 20th May at Western Florist, 109, Negombo Colombo Main Road, Negombo. Cortege leaves the Western Florist at 3.30pm for cremation at the General Cemetery, Negombo. 000001
